subject: PO Box 8000. London SE11 5EN
body:
PO Box 8000. London SE11 5EN, United Kingdom
RF/UKFIU/10/2010/583D
Date:10/27/2023.
Attention: Beneficiary,
We write to inform you that routine chronological system audit
exercise was embarked on the forensic searching a fund was reserved
approved on your name mentioned Usd 45M scheduled already for payment
with a few documentation provision from your side , using official
veto power in assisting you kindly provide , full name, home and
office address , international passport ,tell phone number and bank
details/online access to enable immediate release of said fund,
Note imposters played insincerity action has been placed on justice accordingly.
We thank you for your great service, and be assured you will be paid.
Sincerely,
Bernard Lauwers: Finance Department Director (IMF).

subject: Re:   PO Box 8000. London SE11 5EN
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out and informing me about this. It's quite surprising to hear that a fund has been approved in my name. Could you please provide more details about this routine system audit exercise? I'm curious to know how my name was selected.

Also, could you explain what you mean by "imposters played action has been placed on justice"? I'm not quite sure I understand that part.

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Luis

subject: Looking forward your kind response.
body:
Sir






I write to acknowledge your mail with content well noted.




Thanks for your briefs email.




Source of fund.



The Fund came in as a result of an OVER INVOICE of A SEISMIC CONTRACT
AWARDED/PROJECT.

EXECUTED, COMPLETED AND CERTIFICATE OF COMPLETION GIVEN TO THE CONTRACTOR
from the records this contract/project was done by a foreign firm, BES
ENGINEERING CORPORATION TAIWAN REPUBLIC OF CHINA they have been duly paid
since 2021 APRIL, 27TH,Forty-five million that has been laying on  the IMF
custody of myself  (Bernard Lauwers: Finance Department Director/Audit team
head (IMF) and all the related original Pdf Format documents has been
forwarded and hand over to the paying bank Ahli United Bank London
(Bahrain).



The Contract/Project which was originally valued for (One Hundred and
Twenty Seven Million United States Dollars) U$127, 000, 000, 00 was
manipulated to read (One Hundred and Seventy Two Million United States
Dollars) U$172, 000, 000, 00. The Extra U$45, 000, 000, 00 (Forty Five
Million United States Dollars) is over invoice to be transferred into your
bank account as contract/Inheritance fund.



This contract/project has been completely executed and the contractors have
been paid all their bills remaining this U$45, 000, 000, 00. Therefore,
bear in mind that the original documents will be on your
NAME/Contract/Inheritance fund owner as we sign Deed of Agreement and make
a successful transfer into your bank account within 48HOURS.




A special clearance letter will be written to your country Bank confirming
to them that this is a Foreign Investment Fund coming to you



We are very much aware of all the International Trade and Investment and
Banking Laws of most Countries in the World and we are very much ready for
a successful business outing with your good self.




Note that, Some Corrupt officials that have been dismissed are playing to
claim the fund through the back door. Thatâ€™s why the government has placed
an action of justice on them.



So, don't entertain any fear or protest for any reason FELL FREE.



The documents include;

1. Certificate of Registration

2. Job COMPLETION certificate

3. Certificate of Fund Ownership

4. Deposit Fund Certificate

5. Insurance Certificate

6 Bidding Receipt

7. Sworn affidavit of claim and support Certificate

8. Claim Bond Certificate

9. Letter of authorization.




I am waiting to hear from you.





Sincerely,






Bernard Lauwers: Finance Department Director/ Audit team head.(IMF).

subject: Re: Looking forward your kind response.
body:
Hello,

Thank you for your detailed email. It's quite interesting to learn about the source of the fund and how it came about. I must say, it sounds like a complex process with all those contracts and invoices.

I'm curious, though, how did my name come up in this? And why was there an over-invoice in the first place? Also, could you please explain more about the role of Ahli United Bank London Bahrain in this?

I appreciate your reassurances regarding the legality of this transaction. However, I would like to understand more about these documents you mentioned. What exactly is a Deed of Agreement and what does it entail? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Luis

subject: Re: Looking forward your kind response.
body:
Dear Sir,







I write to acknowledge your mail.







The Contract/Project which was originally valued for (One Hundred and
Twenty Seven Million United States Dollars) U$127, 000, 000, 00 was
manipulated to read (One Hundred and Seventy Two Million United States
Dollars) U$172, 000, 000, 00. The Extra U$45, 000, 000, 00 (Forty Five
Million United States Dollars) is over invoice to be transferred into your
bank account as contract/Inheritance fund.





Kindly note that the Extra U$45, 000, 000, 00 is an invoice.





Ahli United Bank London Bahrain is the paying bank. And all the documents I
mentioned will be sent to you on original copies through courier service
for signing as the next of kin to the contract/Inheritance fund owner.







A Deed of Agreement is an agreement letter that bands us together in
sharing of the fund and understanding.









we are contacting your good self.  And let me remind you once again that
this transaction is one hundred percent RISK FREE from any law of any
country in the world. And we have no doubt in our mind that the trust with
which we have in you will be fulfilled.





For accepting to assist us we offer you once again Thirty percent of the
total amount, Ten percent is set aside for the expenses with which you and
I will incurred during the process of this transfer and the balance of
Sixty percent will be invested on any viable business of your choice, for
example real estate which we already have in mind.  A special clearance
letter will be written to your country Bank confirming to them that this is
an Foreign Investment Fund coming to you.







We are very much aware of all the International Trade and Investment and
Banking Laws of most Countries in the World and we are very much ready for
a successful business outing with your good self.





Kindly provide, full name, home and office address, international passport,
and tell phone number and bank details to enable immediate release of said
fund,







I am waiting to hear from you.







Sincerely,










Bernard Lauwers: Finance Department Director/ Audit team head.(IMF).

subject: Re: Looking forward your kind response.
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out and providing such detailed information about this contract project. It sounds like a significant opportunity, and I appreciate your trust in me.

I'm curious to know more about the nature of the project that led to this over-invoiced amount. Could you please provide some more details? Also, could you explain how the process of transferring these funds would work?

As for the business investment, real estate does sound interesting. However, I'd love to hear more about why you think it's a good choice and what kind of returns we could expect from it.

I must apologize but due to privacy concerns, I am unable to share my personal details such as full name, address, passport number or bank details at this stage. I hope you understand my position.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Luis
